Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to employment of persons and veterans with disabilities by the state
Summary: Relates to employment of persons and veterans with disabilities by the state; provides up to five thousand positions may be filled by persons with a physical or mental disability and up to two thousand positions may be filled by disabled veterans and veterans with disabilities.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to employment of persons and veterans with disabilities by the state
